text: Isabella "Bella" Heathcote (March 3, 1988) is an Australian actress who acts on television programs. She played Amanda Fowler on the Australian soap opera Neighbours. Heathcote also starred in the 2010 movie Not Fade Away. She was born near Melbourne. ==References== Category:Australian television actors Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Melbourne
title: Bella Heathcote
